sourcesContent:
{/* Header */}

Shopping App

{/* Horizontal Divider */}
{/* Filters and Add List Button */}
{/* Render shopping lists as tiles */}
{filteredLists.map((list) => (
goToShoppingListDetail(list)} className="relative p-4 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg hover:bg-gray-200 transition cursor-pointer" > {/* Archive Button */}
{ e.stopPropagation(); toggleArchive(list.id); }} >
✓
{list.archived ? 'Unarchive' : 'Archive'}
{/* List Name */}

{list.name}

{/* Information Section */}

Active Items: {list.items.filter((item) => !item.resolved).length}

Resolved Items: {list.items.filter((item) => item.resolved).length}

{/* Delete Button */}
{ e.stopPropagation(); setConfirmDeleteList(list.id); }} > Delete
))}
{/* Modal for adding a new list */} setIsModalOpen(false)}>

Add New Shopping List

setNewListName(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter list name" className="p-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg shadow-sm w-full mb-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" /> {/* Confirmation Modal for Delete */} setConfirmDeleteList(null)} >

Confirm Delete

Are you sure you want to delete this shopping list? This action cannot be undone.
